name: NumFOCUS
description: NumFOCUS promotes open source scientific software.

projects.summary: Project ideas provided for Google Summer of Code 2025 by the aeon toolkit organization.
List of potential projects for Google Summer of Code 2025 related to the AiiDA computational infrastructure.
Project proposals for statistical data visualization and inference for the GSoC 2025 under ArviZ.
Ideas for projects focusing on package and environment management through the rattler framework for GSoC 2025.
Potential project ideas focused on data retrieval systems for GSoC 2025 by the Data Retriever organization.
Proposals for projects in PV modeling and forecasting for Google Summer of Code 2025, managed by pvlib.
Project ideas related to Python Battery Mathematical Modeling in the context of GSoC 2025.
Ideas for projects focused on probabilistic programming using PyMC for Google Summer of Code 2025.
Project suggestions under the PySAL organization related to spatial analysis for GSoC 2025.
Project ideas for quantum computing simulations in Qutip for the GSoC 2025 program.
Suggestions for machine learning projects within scientific computing for the GSoC 2025 initiative.
Project ideas for data storage and processing in an efficient format under Zarr for Google Summer of Code 2025.

Ideas Pages
===========

[](https://github.com/numfocus/gsoc/blob/master/2025/ideas-list.md#ideas-pages)

This is the home page of projects ideas of NumFOCUS for Google Summer of Code 2025. Since NumFOCUS is an umbrella organization you will only find links to the ideas page of each organization under the NumFOCUS umbrella at this page.

*   [aeon](https://github.com/aeon-toolkit/aeon-admin/blob/main/gsoc/gsoc-2025-projects.md)
*   [AiiDA](https://github.com/aiidateam/aiida-core/wiki/GSoC-2025-Projects)
*   [ArviZ](https://github.com/arviz-devs/arviz/wiki/GsoC-2025-projects)
*   [conda / rattler](https://github.com/conda/rattler/issues/1058)
*   [Data Retriever](https://github.com/weecology/retriever/wiki/GSoC-2025-Project-Ideas)
*   [pvlib](https://github.com/pvlib/pvlib-python/wiki/GSoC-2025-Projects)
*   [PyBaMM](https://pybamm.org/gsoc/2025/)
*   [PyMC](https://github.com/pymc-devs/pymc/wiki/GSoC-2025-projects)
*   [PySAL](https://github.com/pysal/pysal/wiki/Google-Summer-of-Code-2025)
*   [Qutip](https://github.com/qutip/qutip/wiki//Google-Summer-of-Code-2025)
*   [SciML](https://sciml.ai/dev/#google_summer_of_code)
*   [Zarr](https://github.com/zarr-developers/gsoc/blob/main/2025/ideas-list.md)

See the [README](https://github.com/numfocus/gsoc/blob/master/README.md#organizations-confirmed-under-numfocus-umbrella) for contact information of each org.
